name: Restricted Zone
description: A hub of local governance or public administration; adventurers may seek permits, records, or appeal to authorities.
atmosphere: The restricted zone has a tense, forbidden atmosphere with the scent of authority and the sound of guards patrolling the boundaries. The air carries the weight of official secrets and the essential nature of controlled access, while the atmosphere crackles with the tension of forbidden knowledge and the constant threat of discovery for those who dare to trespass.
